delete.where: query_id in (SELECT id FROM query WHERE name IN ('getAllLiveCases', 'getAllArchivedCases', 'getLiveCasesByType', 'getArchivedCasesByType', 'getLiveCaseByCaseNumber', 'getArchivedCaseByCaseNumber', 'getLiveCasesByPartialCaseNumber', 'getArchivedCasesByPartialCaseNumber', 'getLiveCaseByCaseId', 'getArchivedCaseByCaseId', 'getLiveCasesByFilingDate', 'getArchivedCasesByFilingDate', 'getLiveCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseID', 'getArchivedCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseID', 'getLiveCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseNumber', 'getArchivedCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseNumber', 'getLiveCaseFilePath', 'getArchivedCaseFilePath'))

id in (SELECT id FROM query WHERE name IN ('getAllLiveCases', 'getAllArchivedCases', 'getLiveCasesByType', 'getArchivedCasesByType', 'getLiveCaseByCaseNumber', 'getArchivedCaseByCaseNumber', 'getLiveCasesByPartialCaseNumber', 'getArchivedCasesByPartialCaseNumber', 'getLiveCaseByCaseId', 'getArchivedCaseByCaseId', 'getLiveCasesByFilingDate', 'getArchivedCasesByFilingDate', 'getLiveCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseID', 'getArchivedCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseID', 'getLiveCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseNumber', 'getArchivedCaseDocumentDirectoryByCaseNumber', 'getLiveCaseFilePath', 'getArchivedCaseFilePath'))
